decisions.label: Do we need set the parent case to "On hold"?

decisions.label: Is refund case with refund request record?

rules.name: Invalid_statuses_for_to_other_department_process
rules.label: Invalid statuses for to other department process

decisions.description: Validating that the department and team is validated for redirection, support and escalations cases
decisions.name: Is_the_department_validated
decisions.label: Is the department validated?

rules.name: Department_not_available_for_redirection_support_and_escalation
rules.conditionLogic: 1 OR 2 OR (3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6) OR 7
rules.label: Department not available for redirection, support, and escalation

rules.name: Only_support_cases_are_allowed_from_Distribution_department
rules.label: Only support cases are allowed from Distribution department

Flow.description: Use to redirection, support and escalation processes

dynamicChoiceSets.description: The department that which the redirection is going to be sent to
dynamicChoiceSets.name: AvailableDepartment

dynamicChoiceSets.description: The team in the department that is required for the redirection
dynamicChoiceSets.name: AvailableTeam

formulas.name: Outcome
formulas.expression: IF({!Request_Type} = {!Redirection}, "Case has been redirected to", IF({!Request_Type} = {!Support}, "A Support Case has been created to", " Case has been escalated to"))

formulas.name: RecordTypeName
formulas.expression: IF( {!DependentList.topValue} = "Info Hub", "Internal/Backoffice", IF( {!DependentList.topValue} = "Functional Product Support", "Functional Product Support", IF( {!DependentList.topValue} = "Liability", "Claim", "Channel")))

formulas.description: Depending on the priority the IsEscalated value will be set to TRUE or FALSE
formulas.name: SetEscalatedValue

Flow.label: To Other Department

recordCreates.description: Creates a support case based on the information capture in the To Other Department Screen
recordCreates.name: Create_Support_Case
recordCreates.label: Create Support Case

recordLookups.description: Gets all the information of the case where the flow was triggered from
recordLookups.name: GetCurrentCaseInformation
recordLookups.label: GetCurrentCaseInformation

recordUpdates.description: Update the current case to be directed to the right skill
recordUpdates.name: Redirect_Case
recordUpdates.label: Redirect Case

recordUpdates.name: Update_Support_Case_with_Customer_Claim_Info
recordUpdates.label: Update Support Case with Customer Claim Info

fields.name: Closed_Case_Error_Screen
fields.fieldText: ï»¿Cases in "{!GetCurrentCaseInformation.Status}" status cannot be redirected or escalated to other department.

fields.name: ErrorCustomerClaimCreation
fields.fieldText:
Customer Claim cannot be created at this moment.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}


If the error is due to invalid data, please click on "previous", correct the invalid data and try again.

fields.name: ErrorCustomerCreation
fields.fieldText:
Customer cannot be created at this moment.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}


If the error is due to invalid data, please click on "previous", correct the invalid data and try again.

fields.name: Refunds_OC_KANA_Error
fields.fieldText: Department {!DependentList.topValue} is not available for Redirection, Support and Escalations

fields.name: OnlySupportCaseAllowed
fields.fieldText: {!GetCurrentCaseInformation.Team__c} is only allowed to create support cases to other departments and teams

fields.name: EmergencyCase
fields.fieldText: To Other Department functionality is not available for Emergency Cases.

fields.name: Functional_Product_Support_Error
fields.fieldText:
Department Functional Product Support is not available for Redirection, Support and Escalations.


Please use the Functional Product Support action in the utility bar

fields.name: Message
fields.fieldText:
Case cannot be redirected from Customer Claim to Liability. If this claim is a Liability claim please follow.

  • Create liability case
  • Add the customer claim in the parent case field of the liability case and save
  • Click on create liability claim. The system will then fetch all data from the customer claim to populate the fields.

screens.name: Redirection_Submission
screens.label: Redirection Submission

fields.name: FinalOutcome
fields.fieldText: {!Outcome} {!DependentList.topValue}

screens.helpText: If you need to create a new support case, please click on Finish and click on To Other Department

fields.name: ErrorRefundRequestCreation
fields.fieldText:
Refund Request cannot be created at this moment.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}


If the error is due to invalid data, please click on "previous", correct the invalid data and try again.

fields.name: RefundRequestIsNeeded
fields.fieldText:
This Refund case requires a Refund request before Redirection, Support or Escalation.


Please use New Refund Request from case in the right side of the page

screens.description: Input for making a request to another department
screens.name: To_Other_Department
screens.label: To Other Department

fields.name: Reason_for_Redirection_Escalation
fields.helpText: The reason why you are redirecting or escalating the current case

fields.name: Subject
fields.helpText: Please write the subject for creating a support case

fields.name: Description
fields.helpText: Please describe what it is needed from the other department/team

fields.name: RefundRequestInfo

fields.name: RefundRequestPNR
fields.helpText: PNR should be six characters long. If one isn't applicable, enter six dashes ------.

validationRule.errorMessage: PNR should be six characters long. If one isn't applicable, enter six dashes ------.

fields.helpText: Add each passenger on a separate line
